verses.content: LALPA, David chu a rinumtuorna po po Hrietpui la.
LALPA kuoma ṭawng inkhâma, Jakob Mi Hrât kuoma thu a tiemzie kha:
“Ka umna inah lût dêr naw ning a, Ka khumah kai bawk naw ning a.
Ka mithai hi insîm phal naw ning a, Ka mit vunhai hi insîm phal bawk naw ning ah.
LALPA hmun ding ka zawng suok hmakhat chun, Jakob Mi Hrât umna ding chu,” tiin.
Ngai ta, a thu chu Ephrathaah kan hriet a, Rampui phûla chun kan hmu tah a.
Ama umnaahai chun lût ei ta, A ke innghatna bula chun chibai bûk ei tih.
Aw LALPA, tho la, i châwl hmun dinga chun lût rawh, Nang le i hrâtna bâwm leh.
I thiempuhai chu felnain inthuom sienla, I mi inthienghai chu hlimin khêk raw hai se.
I siehlaw David leiin, I hriek nâl hmêl chu innghat kîrtir naw rawh.
LALPA chun David kuomah thutakin ṭawng ân khâm tah a, Chu chu nghatsan naw nih. “I taksa raa mi i lalṭhungphaa chun inṭhungtir ka ta;
I nauhai chun ka thuthlung le, Ka thuinhriettir, anni ka lân chûktir ding chu, an zâwm chun, An nauhai khawm kumkhawtluongin i lalṭhungphaa chun ṭhung pei an tih,” tiin.
LALPA chun Zion chu a thlang sih a; A umna dingin a dit a nih.
“Hi hi kumkhuoa dinga ka châwl hmun ding a nih, Hitaka hin um zing ka tih, ka nuom zâwng a ni sih a.
A fâk ding chu malsâwm rei rui ka ta, A mi rimsihai chu beiin sukkhawp ka tih.
A thiempuhai chu sandamnain inthuom ka ta, A mi inthienghai chu hlimin khêk khêk an tih.
Chutaka chun David ki chu inder suoktir ka ta, Ka hriek nâl ta ding chun khâwnvar ka ruot tah a.
Ama dotuhai chu muolphonain inthuom ka ta, Ama chunga ruok chun a lallu- khum chu tle sur a tih,” tiin.
